attributes.action: ensure the long term security of Arsenal F.C. through ensuring Arsene Wenger stays on as manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"We the undersigned would like to make it known that in our view, the vast SILENT majority of Arsenal fans support Wenger wholeheartedly and wish to see him remain as manager of Arsenal football club. We are utterly horrified and shocked at the hostility and disrespect shown towards Wenger.
We would like the prime minister to show his support for a custodian of the national game in England, through a vocal backing made in public. Wenger's record is without equal in the annals of our history and we urge the prime minister to ensure the Arsenal Board make every effort possible to allow Wenger to continue as arsenal manager."

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
